title: Northern Arc Capital raises $75 million from Dutch development bank
description: A non-bank lender with Rs 10,081 crore in assets plans to deploy funds from newly issued five-year non-convertible debentures to expand retail microloans, SME loans, and green projects. Managing Director Ashish Mehrotra aims to stimulate sustainable economic growth and financial inclusion through these initiatives, supported by impact investor FMO.
